Funds are required for the proper execution of a congressional program increase for atmospheric rivers research. Funding supports the 53rd Weather Reconnaissance Squadron

Funds are available within the OMA appropriation from a congressional increase for human optimization for realignment to RDT&E, PE 0602787A, Medical Technology, for proper execution to meet congressional intent. This is a congressional special interest item.

Funds are available within the Other Procurement, Air Force appropriation from a congressional program increase to General Information Technology for United States Indo-Pacific Command mission partner environment. This realignment to Base Communications Infrastructure is required for the proper execution to meet congressional intent and supports multi-national sharing of select mission data, expansion of foundational coalition network infrastructure west of the international dateline, strengthening the cyber security posture, and modernizing legacy headquarters infrastructure and services to enable a more resilient single pane of glass computing environment. This is a congressional special interest item.

Funds are required for PE 0708045A, End Item Industrial Preparedness Activities, for the proper execution of integrated directed energy testing undertaken to assess and strengthen Directed Energy Industrial Capacity in high energy laser manufacturing in the domestic supply base. The primary objective of these strategic equipment purchases is to increase the capacity at which the critical components for a Directed-Energy Weapon (DEW) of a high-energy laser system are produced. A DEW is a ranged weapon that damages its target with highly focused energy, including High Energy Laser and High Power Microwaves. Specific purchases of manufacturing equipment and materials include but are not limited to: optical fine figuring equipment, large-format interferometer, large Off Axis Parabolas optical coating chambers, high power laser testing stations, alignment verification equipment, laser diode submount production equipment, fiber manufacturing equipment, preform production equipment, high power optical substrate and imaging metrology verification equipment. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were appropriated. This is a base budget requirement.
